price: 27. Yalla inkittoysaanaah Nabii Mucammad Nummaysaanamal Yalli Ateeban (xagana) keen i к beek lakal xagana yaggileeh Yalli xakbaanam keh xakabuh ken kak Amrise Ramad yargiqeeh Baaxo Baysaah Baaxo Bagul umaanc Aba mari, too mari usun Addunyaay Akeeral kasaarite mara kinnon.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَنقُضُونَ عَهۡدَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مِيثَٰقِهِۦ وَيَقۡطَعُونَ مَآ أَمَرَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦٓ أَن يُوصَلَ وَيُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yanquḍūna ʿahda al-lahi min baʿdi mīthāqihi wayaqṭaʿūna mā amara al-lahu bihi an yūṣala wayuf'sidūna fī al-arḍi ulāika humu al-khāsirūna
